title: Direct Preference Optimization for Suppressing Hallucinated Prior Exams in Radiology Report Generation
details: O Banerjee, HY Zhou, S Adithan, S Kwak, K Wu… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Recent advances in generative vision-language models (VLMs) have exciting potential implications for AI in radiology, yet VLMs are also known to produce hallucinations, nonsensical text, and other unwanted behaviors that can waste …
